body_html: No, there's not. We'd have to add an option for our worker threads in the engine to suspend processing of the current function, work on backward called within it, and get back to it later.
body_text: No, there's not. We'd have to add an option for our worker threads in the engine to suspend processing of the current function, work on backward called within it, and get back to it later.
body: No, there's not. We'd have to add an option for our worker threads in the engine to suspend processing of the current function, work on `backward` called within it, and get back to it later.
